mapper.select: SELECT CBL.id, CBL.cone_bucket_num AS coneBucketNum, CBT.type_name AS coneBucketName, CBL.cone_bucket_type AS coneBucketType, CBL.cone_bucket_status AS coneBucketStatus, CBL.road_name AS roadName, CBL.start_time AS startTime, CBL.end_time AS endTime FROM `cone_bucket_log` AS CBL INNER JOIN cone_bucket_type AS CBT ON CBL.cone_bucket_type = CBT.id ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageFirstNum},#{eachPageDataNum};
